dcterms:creator: Alekh Agarwal
Sham M. Kakade
Jason D. Lee
Gaurav Mahajan
dcterms:description: A challenging MDP for exploration where at every state only one out of four actions takes one step forward, closer to the reward appearing at the terminal state, while every other action takes one step back.
dcterms:title: Consecutive Crossroad Traps (CCT)

dcterms:creator: Alekh Agarwal
Mikael Henaff
Sham M. Kakade
Wen Sun
dcterms:description: A stochastic MDP with three paths where trajectories have constant length and rewards are sparse, making exploration challenging.
dcterms:title: Diabolical Combination Lock (DCL)
